projects.title: Data Visualization: HotelViz
desc: This dataviz won the first prize on a Hackathon organized by Argentina National Government in 2013.
Represent the tourist activity in Argentina.
Created with public data by #NARDOZ team in less than 24 hours.

projects.title: Data Visualization: Census
desc: A simple and interactive D3 data visualization using Argentina's population data.
Represent how the most of Argentina's people live just in a couple of cities.
The visitors can 'play' with the slider and make some 'research' with available data. They can share their own and 'most shocking' conclusion.

projects.title: Project: Cargografías
desc: Cargografías Project was born in a hackathon about d3.js organized by Hack Hackers Community in Buenos Aires, last April 20th.
The initial idea was create a d3 plugin to create time series in multiples levels using public charges information of Argentina political system.
The project grew and we work in our free time. Is still a work in progress.
The final goal is represent the public charges of every person from political's system in a simple way, in a timeline.
Also, create a database with historical and validated data to be refence into Journalism's community.

projects.title: Project: Birthday stats
desc: Simple stats and dataviz of your birthday's greetings and actions.
Just for fun and learn D3.js
